column1: Funeral services  will be held Tuesday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 a.m. in the Carroway Funeral Home Chapel in Huntington with Brother Joel Hitchcock officiating. Interment will follow in the Concord Cemetery.    	The family will welcome friends and loved ones from 6:00 to 8:00 p.m. Monday evening at the funeral home in Huntington.
